item.title: Roadmap | Stash
item.description: Project Status Versioning Policy There are 2 parts to versioning policy: Operator version: Stash does not follow semver. Currently Stash operator implementation is considered alpha. Please report any issues you via Github. Once released, the major version of operator is going to point to the Kubernetes client-go version. You can verify this from the glide.yaml file. This means there might be breaking changes between point releases of the operator. This generally manifests as changed annotation keys or their meaning.

item.title: Weclome | Stash
item.description: Stash Stash by AppsCode is a Kubernetes operator for restic. If you are running production workloads in Kubernetes, you might want to take backup of your disks. Using Stash, you can backup Kubernetes volumes mounted in following types of workloads: Deployment DaemonSet ReplicaSet ReplicationController StatefulSet From here you can learn all about Stash’s architecture and how to deploy and use Stash. Concepts. Concepts explain some significant aspect of Stash.
